meanings.definition: A meeting at an agreed time and place.
meanings.sent1: Let's have a rendezvous at the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The friends planned a rendezvous at the cafe for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The secret agents' rendezvous at the library raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Their rendezvous under the stars felt like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The romantic rendezvous by the lake was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To meet at an agreed time and place.
meanings.sent1: We will rendezvous at the corner of the street at 3 PM.
meanings.sent2: Let's rendezvous at the entrance of the museum before the tour.
meanings.sent3: The cats always rendezvous in the backyard for their daily playtime.
meanings.sent4: The two teams will rendezvous on the field for the final match.
meanings.sent5: The birds will rendezvous at the bird feeder every morning.
